author: cnbc.com
title: Pinnacle West Sets Date for 2017 Fourth-Quarter and Full-Year Financial Results, Webcast/Conference Call
text:
PHOENIX--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Pinnacle West Capital Corp. (NYSE: PNW) announced today that it plans to release its 2017 fourth-quarter and full-year financial results before the U.S. financial markets open on Friday, Feb. 23, 2018.
That same day at noon ET (10 a.m. Arizona time), the Company will host a live webcast of management’s conference call to discuss the Company’s results, as well as recent developments. A replay of the webcast can be accessed at pinnaclewest.com/presentations . To access the live conference call by telephone, dial (877) 407-8035 or (201) 689-8035 for international callers. A replay of the call also will be available until 11:59 p.m. (ET), Friday, March 2, 2018, by calling (877) 481-4010 in the U.S. and Canada or (919) 882-2331 internationally and entering conference ID number 23277.
Pinnacle West Capital Corp ., an energy holding company based in Phoenix, has consolidated assets of nearly $17 billion, about 6,200 megawatts of generating capacity and 6,300 employees in Arizona and New Mexico. Through its principal subsidiary, Arizona Public Service , the Company provides retail electricity service to nearly 1.2 million Arizona homes and businesses. For more information about Pinnacle West, visit the Company’s website at pinnaclewest.com .
